pages.text: I have mentioned that wooden Blades are not fit for fighting. They are only too easy to be broken.$(br2)However, Tagayasan and Sagequoia are two unusual wooden Blades.

Tagayasan was one of the only two wooden Bewitched Blades.$(br2)As a wooden Blade, it was as tough and sharp as a steel one. It even needed steel to repair.$(br2)It was pretty strange, since wooden and bamboo Blades were difficult to be infused with Devils' Power.

Sagequoia, whose name means "General's Wooden Blade", had more Spirit Power than Tagayasan.$(br2)It showed its full power to its enemies, just like a general who fought in battlefield.$(br2)This is quite interesting.
